name: Courier could not be created without login
description: Send POST request to {{baseURI}}/api/v1/courier with password and firstName but without login and check that courier is not created

steps.name: Check that response code is equal to 400
Validate that response body contains parameter "message" with value equals to "Недостаточно данных для создания учетной записи"

parameters.name: value
parameters.value: Недостаточно данных для создания учетной записи
